appetizers.name: Code Byte Chips
appetizers.description: Crispy potato slices seasoned with a programmer's touch, served with tangy sour cream dip.

appetizers.name: Algorithmic Avocado Toast
appetizers.description: A delightful blend of creamy avocado spread, fresh cherry tomatoes, and microgreens on toasted multigrain bread.

cold_sandwiches.name: JSON's Classic Club
cold_sandwiches.description: A classic combination of roasted turkey, crispy bacon, lettuce, and tomato with a creamy layer of mayonnaise on toasted sourdough.

cold_sandwiches.name: HTML Veggie Delight
cold_sandwiches.description: A vegetarian delight featuring hummus, crisp cucumber, bell peppers, and red onion with fresh lettuce on wholesome whole wheat bread.

hot_sandwiches.name: Python Pesto Panini
hot_sandwiches.description: Grilled chicken breast, flavorful pesto sauce, and melted mozzarella cheese on warm ciabatta bread, pressed to perfection.

hot_sandwiches.name: Java BBQ Brisket Melt
hot_sandwiches.description: Slow-cooked BBQ brisket, sharp cheddar cheese, caramelized onions, and garlic aioli on toasted sourdough, creating a melt-in-your-mouth experience.

desserts.name: Binary Brownie Bliss
desserts.description: Decadent chocolate brownie served warm, topped with a scoop of creamy vanilla ice cream and drizzled with indulgent chocolate sauce.

desserts.name: CSS Cookie Crunch
desserts.description: A delightful dessert featuring soft-baked chocolate chip cookies, cookies and cream ice cream, and a dollop of whipped cream for the perfect sweet treat.

drinks.name: Java Jolt Cold Brew
drinks.description: Smooth cold brew coffee mixed with milk, sweet cream, and a hint of vanilla syrup, providing a refreshing caffeine boost.

drinks.name: Syntax Soda Fizz
drinks.description: A bubbly and refreshing drink made with sparkling water, fresh lemon slice, and mint leaves, perfect for a crisp and zesty sip.
